Author: meatspoon#7860
Content: I have said this before, but there is a bit of a community relations issue in this discord/community.  A few large, loud personalities dominate the tone of these discussions.  These loud personalities often talk down to people, tell people they are wrong or imply that they are stupid for having the opinions they do.  Its a bad look for new people who come in here, especially because the mods/devs don't really do anything about it, they just shrug as their project's culture is defined (rather negatively) by a small number of KMD Armchair Commandos.
